titles.title: Clap Your Hands all ye people
Shout unto God, with a voice of triumph!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Clap your hands all ye people,
Shout unto God, with a voice of triumph!
Clap your hands all ye people
Shout unto God with a voice of praise!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hosanna! Hosanna!
Shout unto God with a voice of triumph!
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Shout unto God with a voice of praise!
